contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 7 个人能力 Personal Abilities
面试官史密斯先生在询问求职者杰克的个人能力。

contents.title: 史密斯：这个职位需要有相当高的英语水平，你的英语口语和英语写作能力如何？
contents.answer: This position requires a high level of English ability. How is your spoken and written English?

contents.title: 杰克：我学英语已经10年了，而且我通过了大学英语四级和六级考试。
contents.answer: I have learned English for 10 years, and I have passed College English Test Levels 4 and 6.

contents.title: 史密斯：你还能说别的外语吗？
contents.answer: What other foreign languages do you speak?

contents.title: 杰克：我在大学时自学过日语，能用日语进行一些简单的对话。
contents.answer: I have taught myself Japanese in college, and I can carry on simple conversations in Japanese.

contents.content: 个人能力是所有的用人单位都非常关注的问题。如果你的能力很强，自然就会被用人单位看重。所谓的能力，可以是学习能力、创新能力、心理承受力、预见力等综合能力。

contents.title: 史密斯：还有什么吗？
contents.answer: Anything else?

contents.title: 杰克：我有驾照，并且已经有两年的驾龄了。
contents.answer: I have a driver's license, and two years of driving experience.

contents.title: 史密斯：你有什么特殊技能吗？
contents.answer: What special skills do you have?

contents.title: 杰克：我很熟悉Windows操作系统。
contents.answer: I am very familiar with Windows operating system.

contents.content: 面试官也许会直截了当地询问求职者的能力，也可能会问一些具体的工作经历来判定你的能力。陈述时记得要突出你的过人之处。每个人都有自己值得骄傲的经历和技能，要脱颖而出，就必须与众不同。应该适当地举例说明，要用事实和数字说明你的强项。这样才会有说服力，并且使人印象深刻。

contents.title: 史密斯：你在编程方面受到过特殊培训吗？
contents.answer: Have you got any special training in programming?

contents.title: 杰克：没有。不过，在读大学时，我曾选修过计算机课程。
contents.answer: No, but I have taken elective courses in computer in college.

contents.title: 史密斯：你是否具备良好的心理承受能力？
contents.answer: Do you have a good psychological resilience?

contents.title: 杰克：我想我可以在压力下很好地工作。
contents.answer: I think I can work well under pressure.

contents.content: 同时，应当适当表达对用人单位的关注及兴趣，以便引起面试官的注意和好感。而且，要记得，自信但不能自夸。充分地表达你的才能即可，不可过分渲染。

contents.title: 1.他曾接受过有关这类工作的培训，所以认为自己可以胜任这份工作。
contents.answer: He thinks he can fit the position well because he has been trained for these kind of jobs.

contents.title: 2.他可以熟练使用DOS和Windows操作系统。
contents.answer: He can skillfully use DOS and Windows operating system.

contents.title: 3.她也懂法语，能够做些翻译。
contents.answer: She also knows French and can do some translation.

contents.title: 4.他总是敢于创新，不畏挫折。
contents.answer: He is always creative, and isn't afraid when facing drawbacks.

contents.title: 5.她顺利通过了英语专业八级考试，可以胜任文案工作。
contents.answer: She has passed TEM 8, and surely is competent in general office work.

contents.title: 6.她个性随和温厚，和其他人相处得很好。
contents.answer: She is quite easy-going and good-natured, and always gets along well with others.

contents.title: 7.读大学时，你获得过什么荣誉或者奖励吗？
contents.answer: Have you got any honors or rewards in college?

contents.title: 8.你如何与那些不太容易相处的人共事？
contents.answer: How would you deal with those who are not easy to work with?

contents.title: 9.他喜欢问为什么，而且经常独立思考。
contents.answer: He has an inquisitive mind, and is always inclined to think independently.

contents.title: 10.她有着高度的责任心，从来都是今日事今日毕。
contents.answer: She has a strong sense of responsibility, and never puts off till tomorrow what she can fi nish today.
